content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 Euro per month. This should be a fair price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 Euro per month is a very reasonable offer for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. However, I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and the prime location of the apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. How about 550 Euro per month? This is a good middle ground between your desired price and my initial offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 550 Euro per month is closer to my expectations. However, I believe that the apartment's value is even higher due to its modern amenities and central location. Would you be willing to go up to 600 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see your point, but 600 Euro per month is quite a high price for an unfurnished apartment. How about we meet in the middle at 575 Euro per month? This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 575 Euro per month is an improvement, but I'm still seeking a price that reflects the apartment's premium features. Would you be willing to go up to 595 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 595 Euro per month is still quite high for an unfurnished apartment. How about we meet in the middle at 585 Euro per month? This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 585 Euro per month is closer to my expectations. However, I believe that the apartment's quality and location justify a higher price. Would you be willing to go up to 600 Euro per month? This would be a fair reflection of the apartment's value, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 600 Euro per month is still quite high for an unfurnished apartment. How about we meet in the middle at 590 Euro per month? This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 590 Euro per month is an improvement, but I'm still seeking a price that reflects the apartment's premium features. Would you be willing to go up to 600 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
